message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see that under the "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" section, there is a line item called "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 1015922.54. 

Tax Payable represents taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid, so an increase in Tax Payable indicates an increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid.

Therefore, the value of the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid is 1015922.54.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1015922.54'} }
```
